title: Rassegna Stampa - Università degli Studi di Urbino - UniUrb
snippet: This press review from the University of Urbino mentions Fabio Giglietto's participation in a meeting at Facebook's campus in Menlo Park, California, with other researchers to study the role of social media in electoral processes. It lists some of the other prominent scholars who attended the meeting.
description: This press review from the University of Urbino mentions Fabio Giglietto's participation in a meeting at Facebook's campus, where researchers studied social media's role in elections. It confirms his involvement in social media research related to electoral processes.

Coordinated Hateful Disinformation on Italian Politics and Social Issues, since 2017 | Request PDF - ResearchGate
snippet: Mentions Giglietto et al., 2021 in reference to networks spreading harmful inflammatory false stories since 2017. (Dated 2025-08-07)
description: This ResearchGate publication mentions Giglietto et al. in the context of coordinated disinformation campaigns in Italian politics, suggesting his work is being cited in research related to disinformation.
